meanings.definition: A woman who is appointed to carry out the terms of a will.
meanings.sent1: The executrix carefully followed the instructions in the will.
meanings.sent2: The executrix was responsible for distributing the assets according to the will.
meanings.sent3: The executrix accidentally spilled coffee on the will while reading it.
meanings.sent4: She was like an executrix of nature, ensuring everything followed its course.
meanings.sent5: The executrix's role was crucial in ensuring the will was executed correctly.

meanings.sent1: As the executrix, she managed the estate with great care.
meanings.sent2: The executrix oversaw the legal process of the will.
meanings.sent3: The executrix joked that being in charge made her feel like a queen.
meanings.sent4: Her presence in the room was commanding, like that of an executrix.
meanings.sent5: The executrix's determination shone through in every decision she made.
